column1:
"
Test Case 2: Different Arrival Times

Purpose:
This test case checks how SJF handles processes arriving at different times.

Description:
Processes arrive at different time intervals.
Only processes that have already arrived are considered for scheduling.

Expected Behavior:
The first arriving process executes first.
Among available processes, the one with the shortest burst time is selected.

Expected Gantt Chart Order:
P1 → P2 → P4 → P3

Importance:
Verifies correct handling of arrival times and dynamic decision making.
"
